Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1965...
Injured on 4/5/1966 with a Spasms Back, out for 3 weeks...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/1/1969, off Catfish Hunter (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/1/1969, off Catfish Hunter (ATL)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1969, hitting .524 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Was selected to the 1969 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Philadelphia, driving in 8 runs on 6/5/1971...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1971, hitting .480 with 5 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1971, hitting .305 with 12 HR, 26 RBI...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1972 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against San Francisco on 8/22/1972...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Philadelphia on 5/12/1973...
Hit 3 homeruns against Philadelphia, driving in 5 runs on 5/12/1973...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1975, hitting .323 with 5 HR, 25 RBI...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Had 23-game hitting streak snapped on 7/28/1975...
Won World Series with Chicago (N) in 1975...
Injured on 5/11/1976 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Philadelphia on 7/20/1976...
